SEARCH
Package Model

Class HotelListManager

java.lang.Object
Model.HotelListManager
public class HotelListManager extends Object

The HotelListManager class manages a collection of hotels within the hotel reservation system. It provides functionality to create hotels, check uniqueness of hotel names, find hotels by name, remove hotels, and display a list of all hotels currently managed.

Version:
4.4
Author:
Jusper Angelo Cesar

    • prefixGenerator

      private String prefixGenerator()
      Generates the next prefix for the room in the list of hotel.
      Returns:

    • getHotelListSize

      public int getHotelListSize()
      Returns the number of hotels currently in the list.
      Returns:
      the size of the hotel list.

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Hotel hotel)
      Checks if hotel is part of list
      Parameters:
      hotel - the hotel to look for
      Returns:
      if hotel is part of the list

    • createHotel

      public void createHotel(String name, double price, int standard, int deluxe, int executive) throws Exception
      Creates a new hotel and adds it to the list of hotels.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the hotel.
      price - the base price for rooms in the hotel.
      standard - the number of standard rooms in the hotel.
      deluxe - the number of deluxe rooms in the hotel.
      executive - the number of executive rooms in the hotel.
      Throws:
      Exception - if a hotel with the same name already exists.

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the list of hotels is empty.
      Returns:
      true if there are no hotels in the system, false otherwise.

    • isHotelNameUnique

      public boolean isHotelNameUnique(String name)
      Checks if a hotel name is unique among all existing hotels in the system.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the hotel to check for uniqueness.
      Returns:
      true if the hotel name is unique, false otherwise.

    • findHotel

      public Hotel findHotel(String name)
      Finds a hotel by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the hotel to find.
      Returns:
      The Hotel object if found, or null if not found.

    • remove

      public void remove(Hotel hotel)
      Removes a specified hotel from the system.
      Parameters:
      hotel - The Hotel object to remove from the system.

    • hotelsText

      public String hotelsText()
      Returns a list of all hotels currently managed by the system. Each hotel is listed with a bullet symbol and its name.
      Returns:
      the list of hotels in text form.

    • getHotel

      public Hotel getHotel(int i)
      Retrieves the hotel at the specified index from the list of hotels.
      Parameters:
      i - The index of the hotel in the list.
      Returns:
      The Hotel object at the specified index.

    • changeHotelName

      public void changeHotelName(String oldName, String newName)
      Changes the name of a hotel from the old name to the new name, ensuring the new name is unique.
      Parameters:
      oldName - The current name of the hotel.
      newName - The new name to be assigned to the hotel.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the hotel with the old name is not found or if a hotel with the new name already exists.
